name: Automated Local Business Lead Generator with AI, Social Media & WhatsApp Links

user.name: Budi SJ
user.bio: I‚Äôm a Product Designer who also works as an Automation Developer. With a background in product design and systems thinking, I build user-centered workflows. My focus is on helping teams and businesses work more productively through impactful automation systems.

description:
# Automated Local Business Lead Generator with AI, Social Media & WhatsApp Links

This workflow automates the process of generating and managing local business leads by scraping Google Maps data, analyzing business information with AI, and creating personalized outreach messages. The system searches for local businesses based on keywords and locations, extracts their contact information and reviews, then generates professional outreach messages tailored to each business. Results are stored in Google Sheets and notifications are sent via Telegram.


üìä **Google Sheets Template**
Use this template: [Local Business Lead Generator](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1s1N_cAFoKtCsolQh4v3QZpqr8KmVzi7agKHr5MdBEBs/edit?usp=sharing)


## üîë Key Features
- üîç Searches Google Maps for local businesses using SerpAPI based on keywords and location parameters  
- üìã Collects comprehensive business information including name, address, rating, reviews, phone numbers, and websites  
- ü§ñ Uses OpenRouter's LLM to analyze business data and generate personalized outreach messages  
- üåê Analyzes business websites to provide targeted improvement suggestions  
- üì± Automatically detects Instagram and TikTok profiles from business websites  
- üó£Ô∏è Generates messages in the local language based on country code settings  
- üìä Organizes and stores all collected data in Google Sheets with proper categorization  
- üöÄ Sends real-time updates and lead summaries via Telegram bot  
- üí¨ Automatically creates WhatsApp links for easy business communication  

---

## üîß Requirements
- **SerpAPI Account + API Key** ‚Äì For Google Maps business data extraction  
- **OpenRouter Account + API Key** ‚Äì For AI-powered message generation and analysis  
- **Telegram Bot + API Token** ‚Äì For notifications and bot interactions  
- **Google Sheets** ‚Äì Connected to n8n for data storage  
- **Google Sheets Template** ‚Äì Pre-configured with proper column structure  

---

## üéÅ Benefits
- Fully automated lead generation and outreach system  
- Saves time and increases efficiency for local business marketing  
- High personalization improves engagement and response rate  
- Scalable for any niche or location

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

workflow.name: Automated Local Business Lead Generator with AI, Social Media & WhatsApp Links

messageValues.message:
=You are a digital business consultant. Based on the business information below, write a professional message directly addressed to the business owner.
The message should include:

A brief summary of how the business is currently positioned (based on business type and typical customers)
What customers likely appreciate most about the business
Areas that could be improved for better visibility, engagement, or conversions
One actionable suggestion or opportunity for growth
A short, persuasive closing line or CTA inviting them to improve their online presence or marketing strategy
Use a helpful and respectful tone as if offering a free evaluation. Write in the language corresponding to the country code: {{ $('Get row(s) in sheet').item.json['country code'] }}.

nodes.name: Append or update row in sheet

messageValues.message:
=Please help create a professional message to the business owner based on the following website content. Focus on a brief analysis and improvement suggestions, and conclude with an invitation to discuss with our digital agency.

Format the message like this:
---

We visited [business name]'s website and found that [...].
[Paragraph 2: Suggested technical/UX/SEO improvements in a polite and professional manner.]
[Paragraph 3: Suggestion from the agency, including name and CTA.]

Use a polite, clear, and concise style. Use emoji to make more interactive. Write in country code {{ $('Get row(s) in sheet').item.json['country code'] }} language.

parameters.content:
# Automated Local Business Lead Generator with AI, Social Media & WhatsApp Links

This workflow automates the process of generating and managing local business leads by scraping Google Maps data, analyzing business information with AI, and creating personalized outreach messages. The system searches for local businesses based on keywords and locations, extracts their contact information and reviews, then generates professional outreach messages tailored to each business. Results are stored in Google Sheets and notifications are sent via Telegram.


üìä **Google Sheets Template**
Use this template: [Local Business Lead Generator](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1s1N_cAFoKtCsolQh4v3QZpqr8KmVzi7agKHr5MdBEBs/edit?usp=sharing)


## üîë Key Features
- üîç Searches Google Maps for local businesses using SerpAPI based on keywords and location parameters  
- üìã Collects comprehensive business information including name, address, rating, reviews, phone numbers, and websites  
- ü§ñ Uses OpenRouter's LLM to analyze business data and generate personalized outreach messages  
- üåê Analyzes business websites to provide targeted improvement suggestions  
- üì± Automatically detects Instagram and TikTok profiles from business websites  
- üó£Ô∏è Generates messages in the local language based on country code settings  
- üìä Organizes and stores all collected data in Google Sheets with proper categorization  
- üöÄ Sends real-time updates and lead summaries via Telegram bot  
- üí¨ Automatically creates WhatsApp links for easy business communication  

---

## üîß Requirements
- ‚úÖ **SerpAPI Account + API Key** ‚Äì For Google Maps business data extraction  
- ‚úÖ **OpenRouter Account + API Key** ‚Äì For AI-powered message generation and analysis  
- ‚úÖ **Telegram Bot + API Token** ‚Äì For notifications and bot interactions  
- ‚úÖ **Google Sheets** ‚Äì Connected to n8n for data storage  
- ‚úÖ **Google Sheets Template** ‚Äì Pre-configured with proper column structure  

---

## üéÅ Benefits
- Fully automated lead generation and outreach system  
- Saves time and increases efficiency for local business marketing  
- High personalization improves engagement and response rate  
- Scalable for any niche or location

- Run workflows automatically based on a specified schedule.
- Fetch data from a Google Sheet containing a list of keywords and search locations.
- Send requests to SerpAPI to retrieve business data from Google Maps based on input from the Sheet.

- Break the local results array from the SerpAPI JSON output into individual items for individual processing.
- Save each business result to a Google Sheet (results tab), using the ID data as the matching column.
- Retrieve data from the results sheet for further analysis or processing.
- Filter unsummarized data for further processing.

- Limit the number of items submitted to LLM for efficiency (e.g., only 5 businesses per batch)
- Generate a review summary using a business information-based prompt.
- The AI model used by the LLM Chain node above.
- Save the review_summary results to Google Sheets (results tab), matching based on ID data.
- Check if the business has a website for further processing.

- Fetch HTML content from a business website.
- Extract important elements from the HTML using Regex, then organize them into a ready to use summary.
- Provide an AI model for generating summaries.

- Save analysis results to Google Sheets.
- Send automatic notifications to Telegram once data is processed and saved.

- Find Instagram and TikTok account links from business website pages.
- Save Instagram and TikTok extraction results to Google Sheets.
